description: Stores a list of previous payment transactions on the premium billing account for the premium billing invoice.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing invoice.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the previous payment ID on the invoice.

columns.name: PREV_PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing account transaction associated with payment received between the last invoice and this invoice.
